about_the_game:
Lythe The Forgetful Witch: A Visual Novel is a reimagining of the classic tale of The Wizard of Oz, featuring horror monsters in a spooky land called Samhain, which exists in perpetual night. Follow the naïve young witch, Lythe, as she navigates her journey to find the High Witch of Samhain with her apathetic Sphinx cat Bartholomew and a disgruntled grimoire named Grimm. Along the way, Lythe's friendships spark change, helping each character pursue their deepest desires—whether it's a brain, heart, or courage.

In this demo, players can expect around 15-20 minutes of gameplay. Players can play all of chapter one and about half of chapter two. Features such as spell crafting and casting are available in the demo, but will be improved and expanded upon in the full version. Additional chapters, branching storylines, and endings will only be available in the full version.

Demo features:

  • Point-and-click rune finding

  • Drag and drop spell crafting with riddle solving elements

  • QTE spell casting with memory game elements

short_description: Guide Lythe, a naïve witch on a journey through the spooky world of Samhain, as she seeks the High Witch and rediscovers her magic. This visual novel features spell crafting, rune seeking, and memory game mechanics, all while unraveling the desires of her monstrous friends!
